email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out with a freight offer for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. We have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight rate is $52.50 per ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider $50.75 per ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can adjust the freight rate to $51.25 per ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $51.25 per ton is acceptable. However, the demurrage rate is a bit steep. Can we negotiate it down to $22,000 per day? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s draft and ETA to Rotterdam? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can agree to $22,000 per day for demurrage. The vessel’s draft is 18.5m, and the ETA to Rotterdam is 14 October. Please let me know if we can proceed with these terms. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The terms are acceptable. Let’s proceed with the freight rate of $51.25 per ton and demurrage at $22,000 per day. Please send over the recap for confirmation. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Recap: Crude Oil Shipment Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, here’s the recap: Vessel: MV Ocean Star, DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m, Draft: 18.5m. Cargo: Crude Oil, 140,000 MT. Load Port: Rotterdam, Discharge Port: Singapore. Laycan: 15-20 October. Freight Rate: $51.25 per ton. Demurrage: $22,000 per day. Please confirm if everything is in order. Best regards, Sarah
